name: TalkMan Travel: Paris
overview: Talkman Travel will act as an "interactive pocket tour guide" for PSP owners traveling to places like Tokyo, Paris or Rome. With support for Japanese, French and Italian, Talkman Travel provides approximately 150 phrases that would be commonly used by tourists and can also provide the audio for those phrases. Talkman Travel will also boast photos of key places in the respective cities, along with descriptions for each photo. But what really caught our eye was the database of pick-up lines that is also stored in Talkman Travel. You can now turn your PSP into a dating machine which will provide you with romantic phrases to charm the guys and gals of the world. Inaba also mentions that Talkman Travel will have three mini-games that can be played on your own or with others - perhaps that cute local you've just charmed with your talking PSP. Despite the quirkiness of this feature, it does seem quite handy when you really think about it...
